<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/notification"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Enables the notification type specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Badges","RoomsActivity","DailyFeed","UsefullTips"],"type":"string","description":"[Badges - Badges, RoomsActivity - Rooms activity, DailyFeed - Daily feed, UsefullTips - Usefull tips]","example":"Badges"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Badges, 1 - Rooms activity, 2 - Daily feed, 3 - Usefull tips]","example":0}],"title":"ASC.Web.Core.Notify.NotificationType"},"isEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the notification type is enabled or not","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Notification settings request parameters","title":"ASC.Web.Api.ApiModels.RequestsDto.NotificationSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Notification settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Badges","RoomsActivity","DailyFeed","UsefullTips"],"type":"string","description":"[Badges - Badges, RoomsActivity - Rooms activity, DailyFeed - Daily feed, UsefullTips - Usefull tips]","example":"Badges"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Badges, 1 - Rooms activity, 2 - Daily feed, 3 - Usefull tips]","example":0}],"title":"ASC.Web.Core.Notify.NotificationType"},"isEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the notification type is enabled or not","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"ASC.Web.Api.ApiModels.ResponseDto.NotificationSettingsDto"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
